Although you have become somewhat attached to Princess Elia, you have just spent the last month on board a ship at sea. After completing such a long journey, you are quite unwilling to go on another journey so soon after. Especially since this one would be on horseback.

Besides, you figure somebody has to keep Rhaenys and Aegon company while their mother is away. Furthermore, you are interested in getting to know Lady Ashara a little better, and you do not think she or Elia Martell will have any problem with that.

Therefore, you tell Princess Elia that you would rather stay in Starfall while she travels to the Tower of Joy. Thankfully, she is totally understanding.

You spend most of the rest of the day with Princess Elia, Rhaenys, Aegon, and Lady Ashara. You hang out and play in the courtyard of Starfall mostly. You even have a picnic lunch there.

Shortly after dinnertime, Princess Elia, the maester of Starfall, and a group of House Dayne guards ride for the Red Mountains. They should be back within a fortnight or so, assuming they encounter no setbacks.

After the princess leaves, Lady Ashara brings you and your new siblings to the nursery. She proceeds to change and dress Rhaenys and Aegon for bed. She puts both of them in a crib large enough to hold the two of them. Once the Targaryen children are tucked in and settled down for the night, Lady Ashara turns her attention to you and...
1323312212212122.title: Waiting with the Lady-in-Waiting

13233122122121222.content:
Lady Ashara smiles softly, extends her hand to you, and says "Come with me, Brynden."

Seeing no reason to refuse, you obediently hold out your hand, which she promptly takes in hers. She then leads you out of the nursery and down the adjoining hallways. You assume she is taking you to a bedroom that has been prepared for you.

Eventually, she does indeed bring you to a bedchamber. However, she steps inside the room with you, and she closes the door behind her. You wonder what is going on. You look around and ask "Whose room is this, milady?"

"Mine," she replies simply, "And, until Elia gets back, yours, too."

You are stunned by that answer. Before you have a chance to question it, Lady Ashara places her hands on your shoulders and tells you "Elia is dear to me; she is like a sister. Therefore, I want you to think of me as your Auntie Ash. I will care for you just as she does for the next two weeks."

While you are still a little surprised, you have no real issue with that proposal. A thought occurs to you. You mutter "When you say 'just as she does...?'"

Ashara Dayne smirks, embraces you suggestively, and says "Now, come on. Out of those clothes."

Before you can even register what is happening, Lady Ashara proceeds to strip you out of your armor and other apparel. Soon, you are in nothing but your thick cloth diapers. You are only slightly inclined to cover them up. Truthfully, after spending the last month in front of Princess Elia in just your nappies, your sense of shame has dropped greatly.

Lady Ashara then guides you over to the bed and has you lie down on your back. She then leans over you, rubs your diapered crotch sensually, and whispers "You just stay right here. Auntie needs to get changed."

Your member starts to rise a little underneath the thick padding. Ashara just giggles, pats your padded manhood a bit, and heads off to the other side of the room. She disappears behind a changing screen. You do nothing but remain on her bed, wondering what awaits you next.

A couple minutes later, Lady Ashara emerges from behind the changing screen, clad in...
13233122122121222.title: ... escorts you to her bedchamber

135.content:
Alright, so Robert Baratheon has already been King of Westeros for fifteen years.

Now that we have an idea of when this takes place, let us continue.

As you urge Aerion to take you down the eastern road, you wonder where you should head.

If you follow this road all the way to the end, you will enter the Vale and ultimately end up at the Bloody Gate. Once behind the Bloody Gate, your safety is all but guaranteed, and you could find work and shelter at the Eyrie, the ancestral home of House Arryn. However, first you need to venture through miles of dangerous terrain. The area between the crossroads and the Bloody Gate is crawling with many clans of wild men and unsavory beasts such as shadowcats. Furthermore, you have no way of knowing if the Knight of the Bloody Gate will allow you entrance. You would definitely be taking a gamble if you choose that path.

Another option is to only follow the eastern road until you reach the border between the Riverlands and the Vale. Once there, you can turn southeast, towards the Crownlands. From there, you have options aplenty.

Your two most promising prospects would be Dragonstone or King's Landing. The island stronghold where privacy is guaranteed, and the capital city, where work is in abundance.

So... where will you go?
135.title: During the events of the series. (298 A.C.)

choices: You reach the Bloody Gate without a problem
You encounter a problem before you are even halfway there
You come across a problem when you are almost within sight of the Gate
1351.content:
Despite the dangerous challenges that stand between you and the Bloody Gate, you feel as though the trip would be worth it.

Based on what you've heard of it, the Vale is perhaps the most secure of the Seven Kingdoms. All of the noble houses are unquestionably loyal to their liege lord, the smallfolk are kept fed and relatively happy, the terrain allows for impenetrable defenses, there is no shortage of paying work, and they have no notable conflicts or rivalries with the other eight regions of Westeros. In fact, the Vale was the only region that had remained completely neutral during the recent War of the Five Kings.

The only real downside is that most of the women from the Vale are not especially noteworthy in appearance. But you can accept that. After all, beauty means nothing if a loving and caring personality do not complement it. Besides... there are bound to be some attractive women there.

At any rate, you have Aerion follow the road to the east. Within a few hours, you arrive at the border of the Riverlands and the Vale. Based on maps and what you've heard from fellow travelers, it is about a day's ride to the Bloody Gate if you move at a leisurely trot. Some have gotten there in as little as half a day if they gallop straight there without stopping.

You decide to go with the latter approach. You are already accepting a huge enough risk by entering the Vale through the west by yourself. You are unwilling to risk your life or Aerion's any further by being too slow.

Thankfully, you have not done much riding in the past few days, and Aerion had plenty to eat and drink before you left the inn. With that in mind, you should be able to reach the Bloody Gate without tiring him. You just hope you are not overestimating his tenacity.

After taking a couple minutes to prepare yourself, you strike the reins and urge Aerion to proceed. He breaks into a gallop, and the two of you enter the Vale. All you can do at this point is pray that the gods will watch over both of you for the next twelve hours.
1351.title: The Vale

13513.content:
The first hour of your ride goes by without incident. The second fares the same. The third, as well. Then the fourth. The fifth. The sixth. The seventh, eighth, ninth, tenth, and eleventh. Eleven whole hours elapse without any dangers presenting themselves to you.

You are honestly quite amazed that nothing has interrupted your ride so far. It is almost as though the western mountains of the Vale are totally devoid of all life. It could be possible that they actually are. On the other hand, you have been focused on the road for the majority of your ride. You have only stolen occasional glances at your surroundings. Thus, it could be possible that the mountain clansmen and beasts of the Vale were somewhere above you, and you just did not notice them.

All the same, you choose not to question your good fortune. The first eleven hours of your journey may have passed without any type of calamity, but you know full well that all it takes is one second for your circumstances to change for the worse.

The first half of the final hour of your trek proceeds much like the rest. After that, the Bloody Gate is finally within your field of vision. Even from this distance, you can tell that it is heavily guarded. The sentries do not appear to have noticed you yet, but soon enough, you are certain they will. After all, the Bloody Gate has withstood every invasion that ever fell against it. It could not have lasted so long if the men guarding it were negligent in their duties.

When you are just ten minutes away from the Bloody Gate, you finally encounter an obstruction. What?
13513.title: Trouble Close to the Haven

choices: You are wounded just before you reach the Gate
135132.content:
Without warning, a huge mound of black fur lunges in front of you. Aerion is so startled that he rears up on his hind legs and lets out a terrified whinny. You manage to remain mounted on him, but only by clinging tightly to his halter.

When Aerion lowers his front legs, he is still very restless. You can see why. The mound of black fur turned out to be a shadowcat. A very hungry-looking and feral shadowcat, at that. You quickly think about what to do.

You are armed with a sword and a dagger; both made of relatively good steel. You also have a bow and quiver of arrows strapped to your back. You are fairly decent with all of those weapons. However, you do not have much experience fighting with them while mounted. With Aerion in his current frightened state, you doubt you would have much success at fending off the shadowcat on horseback. And you are not about to dismount. You know better than to engage a predator like the shadowcat alone on foot. Aside from that, you are not about to take a chance that Aerion might bolt away without you, or - worse yet - that the shadowcat will attack him instead of you.

In the end, your only feasible option is to bolt for the Bloody Gate. You strike the reins again and direct Aerion towards the structure. You leave the shadowcat in the dust, but the beast does not give up so easily. It chases after you, intent on catching its prey.

With each passing minute, you get closer to the Bloody Gate. Every few seconds, you glance over your shoulder. The shadowcat is gaining on you. Your heart is racing and your breathing slows greatly, but you do not give in to fear. You did not come this far just to be supper for a rabid creature.

What happens?
135132.title: A shadowcat

choices: You wake up in a woman's arms
You wake up just inside the Bloody Gate
1351322.content:
By this point, the men standing atop and around the Bloody Gate have noticed you. They have undoubtedly noticed the shadowcat, as well. You hear a couple of them shouting. While you cannot make out what they are saying, a couple are pointing down the road in your direction. They must perceive the shadowcat as a threat. Hopefully, they are not so quick to make the same ruling about you.

There are a few archers on either side of the Gate. They have already notched arrows to their bows and pulled back the strings. They appear to be aiming for the shadowcat. Unfortunately, based on positioning, you are obstructing their view of the beast. If only you were another foot to the left or right; then at least a couple of the archers would see it clearly. But you cannot get Aerion to get any direction other than forward, so that is out of the question.

When you are practically within spitting distance of the Bloody Gate, you look back one last time. The shadowcat lunges upward and directly at you. Its claws and fangs do not touch you, but the impact of its body weight against you is enough to throw you from your saddle. You land on the ground hard, your head slamming against a boulder. That is enough to severely disorient you.

The shadowcat then turns its attention to you, and it approaches you slowly. Although you are unable to move or speak, your vision has not yet been impaired. You can quite clearly see the shadowcat advancing towards you. It means to make a meal out of you, and you are powerless to stop it. What a dismal turn of events THIS has been.

Then, to your vast relief, just before the shadowcat can pounce, it is hit in the head and body by half a dozen arrows. It stumbles for a moment, and then it collapses onto its side, dead. The men on the Bloody Gate have saved your life. If only you were in a position to thank them.

By now, your vision has begun to blur. You struggle to remain conscious, but the damage from that blow has been done. Within another minute, you pass out.
1351322.title: Wounded Just Before

choices: "To be a younger brother to my son."
13513221.content:
Eventually, you awaken. You are still a little dizzy from hitting your head, but otherwise, you've regained your senses.

The first thing you notice is the change in your surroundings. You are no longer on the road outside the Bloody Gate. In fact, you are not outside at all. You are indoors, and you are lying on a large, soft bed.

You quickly realize you are not alone, either. A pair of arms is wrapped around you. You slowly gaze upward, and you are staring into the eyes of a young woman. She appears to be in her early thirties, and she has auburn hair and red lips. There are a few wrinkles on her cheeks and forehead, but other than that, she has a very wonderful face. When she notices your eyes are open, she smiles and says "At last, you're awake."

Although your present circumstances are much preferable to what they were when you passed out, you cannot bring yourself to relax just yet. You have many questions, and you are not even certain what order you should be asking them in.

You decide to start with the most obvious one: "My lady... might I ask your name?"

She nods and says "I am Lysa Arryn, formerly of House Tully, Lady of the Eyrie."

You are familiar with that name. Lysa Tully was the younger daughter of the late Lord Hoster Tully, the Lord of Riverrun and Lord Paramount of the Riverlands and Trident. He had married his younger daughter to the late Lord Jon Arryn, the elderly Lord Paramount of the Vale. You had heard that Lord Jon was over forty years older than his wife, and their marriage had not been a happy one.

Out of courtesy, you proceed to introduce yourself: "My name is Brynden."

Lady Lysa smiles at that. "My beloved uncle has the same name."

Indeed, Ser Brynden Tully - known as the Blackfish by some - was Lord Hoster's renowned younger brother. You heard somewhere that he had been Knight of the Bloody Gate for several years before he joined his other niece - Lady Catelyn Stark - in the War of the Five Kings.

That brings you to your next question: "Am I in the Eyrie?"

"You are," she confirms, "You are miles above the surface of the world. As long as you are here, you will be safe from the troubles outside."

You are relieved to hear that, but then you remember something important. You mutter worriedly "What about my horse, Aerion? What happened to him?"

"He is well," Lady Lysa assures you, "Of course, we could not bring him up here, but he is being tended to at the stables located at the base of the mountain."

"Thank the gods," you say. You were concerned that Aerion may have run away or gotten left outside the Bloody Gate. He is precious to you; he is your only true friend in the world.

"Have you any more questions?" Lady Lysa Arryn asks

"Just one," you respond, "Why am I here?"

At that, she looks you in the eye and answers you with
13513221.title: Guest of the Eyrie

choices: She reveals that you are diapered
135132211.content:
"You are here to be a younger brother to my son, Robin," Lady Lysa Arryn informs you.

That takes you by surprise. "What do you mean?"

"I suppose that does deserves some explanation," Lysa remarks, "I suffered a number of stillbirths and miscarriages during my marriage to my late husband. My son, Robin, was the only one among them who lived past birth. I always yearned for more children. By happy coincidence, Robin now yearns for a younger sibling. Alas, his father died before I could give him one. Even so, I have other ways of fulfilling my wish and his."

You quickly realize where she is going with this. "So, you decided to use me for that role?"

"Correct," Lysa Arryn claims, "Let me tell you why I chose you. You were able to make your way through the mountains outside of the Bloody Gate all on your own. Only someone as strong as an Arryn could have managed such an incredible feat. Also, you are quite young, and you do not have the look of a noble. Assuming you knew the risks when you entered the Vale alone, it is unlikely you had any family or friends you were leaving behind. That is what the maester concluded."

"Your maester is right," you reveal, "I came to the Vale looking for work, and I would be content to stay here, as I am alone in the world."

"Not any longer," Lysa counters, giving you a hug, "From now on, you will live with me and Robin as my younger son."

A thought occurs to you. "How old is Robin?"

"Eight," she replies.

You are surprised. "I am almost twice that age."

"I know," Lysa tells you, "But Robin insisted on a younger sibling. I would ask that you indulge his wishes. Whenever he is upset, he gets the shacking fits. Aside from that..."
135132211.title: Sweetrobin's Brother

1351322111.content:
This whole time, you and Lysa have been lying under the covers of the bed. At this moment, she begins to remove the covers and push them down the bed. It is only now that you realize that you are topless. For that matter, so is she. As it happens, all she is wearing is her smallclothes.

Her breasts have been pressing into your back for the last few minutes. Now that you actually see them, you realize they are even larger than they felt. They are round, perky, and supple. Just a few seconds after gazing upon them, you feel your manhood twitch and get hard. However, something prevents your manhood from becoming erect. Something rather soft and thick around your loins.

You turn to your front and look down. That is when you see that your legs are bare, but your privates are not uncovered. A thick, white layer of padding has been wrapped tightly around your crotch and bottom. It only take you a couple seconds to identify it as a clean, white cloth diaper, pinned securely in place. As of now, that is the only article of clothing you are wearing.

You are alarmed to discover this. You turn back to Lysa and ask nervously "Why am I wearing a nappy?"

She just smiles kindly and explains "There are two reasons. Firstly, you were unconscious for several days. This was the easiest way to keep you from soiling yourself or the bedding whenever you relieved yourself. Secondly... they are necessary to get you into your new role."

Your eyes widen in shock. "But I do not need nappies! I know perfectly well how to use chamber pots."

"As of now, the chamber pots are off-limits to you," Lady Lysa mutters sternly, patting the seat of your diapers, "I expect you to use these for their intended uses. You need not fret; I will change you whenever you require it."

It appears she is allowing no room for argument. As much as you would like to protest, doing so would not get you anywhere. You ask "What else would this involve?"

"Breastfeeding, of course," Lysa reveals, "I still feed Robin from my breast; it is only natural that I do the same for you. And before you claim to be too old for that, you should know that you've already been doing it for these last few days. It was the only way we could give you sustenance."

You have mixed reactions to that. You have often dreamed about nursing from a beautiful woman. To discover that you were going to be doing it a lot - and that you had already been doing it for a short while - excited you. The tent in your diapers grew a little bigger.

Lysa notices your padded erection, and she smiles and pats it, causing you to gasp softly. Keeping one hand on your nappy, she says "You will be treated as a babe for the most part. But when it is just the two of us by ourselves, I would be happy to treat you in a more 'adult' fashion."

That alone has officially won you over. You announce "Alright, I agree. I'll be your second son and Robin's younger brother."

Lady Lysa Arryn smiles and kisses you on the forehead, saying "Thank you."

Just then, there is a knock on the door to the bedchamber, and a young boy's voice calls out "Mummy, may I come in?"

"Yes, sweetheart," Lysa calls out, "You are just in time; your brother is awake."

Immediately, the door swings open, and a young boy - obviously Robin - enters. He approaches the bed excitedly.

Is Robin diapered, too?
1351322111.title: Already Dressed for the Part

choices: "Let's go see the maester for a checkup."
13513221111.content:
As Robin Arryn approaches the bed, you notice how he is dressed. At first, it appears that he is only clad in a loose, cotton shirt. You quickly realize his lower half is not naked; he actually is wearing smallclothes. However, his smallclothes seem rather bulky and cumbersome. When he reaches the bed, you discover that they are not smallclothes at all. Down there, he is wearing the same article as you.

The other diapered boy climbs onto the bed, and he crawls towards you and his mother. His thickly padded bottom is raised high in the air. You cannot help but stare at it in confusion. You wonder if this is customary for all Arryns, or if Lady Lysa just prefers to treat all her children like this.

Either way, one thing is for certain: you and Robin are in nappies, and you are expected to wear and use them until further notice.

Robin smiles up at you when he reaches you, and he wraps his arms around your chest. He is not a very strong child. In fact, he looks rather sickly and weak. Even so, his hug is certainly warm and caring. You do not wish to upset him or your new mother, so you decide to return it.

Lady Lysa comes up behind you and joins in the hug, enveloping you and her true son. Despite the awkwardness of the situation, you cannot deny that this is a very reassuring and pleasant sensation. Perhaps this is what it really means to be loved.

After the hug, Lady Lysa turns you and Robin towards her. She announces happily "Time for a nappy check."

She reaches down with both hands. She places the right one against the front of Robin's padding, and she places the left one against the front of yours. Robin giggles at being checked, whereas you have to struggle not to get too excited.

A few seconds later, Lysa Arryn smiles and says "Good; you're both still dry."

That is a relief. Although you have apparently been using your diapers in your sleep for the last few days, you are not quite certain you are ready to do the same while you are conscious. Of course, you do not really have a say in the matter. Soon enough, you will be forced to wet and mess them. But at least you have a kind and beautiful mother to change you whenever that happens.

Lysa smiles again, looks around at you and your "brother," and she declares...
13513221111.title: Yes, he is

choices: the maester is the only one there
two other people (Sansa and Littlefinger) are there with him.
135132211112.content:
"Let's go see Maester Colemon," Lysa declares, "You're both due for a checkup."

"Alright, Mummy," Robin says obediently.

"As you wish... Mummy," you remark, hesitantly.

Lysa then gets out of bed, still in just her smallclothes. You expect her to summon some maids and get garbed in a formal dress or something similar. Yet she does not. Instead, she simply slips on a nightgown, and over that she pulls on a thick woolen robe. Lastly, she dons some soft slippers.

You are bewildered by her casual, informal dress. You had heard that nobles always wore formal attire outside of their bedchambers. Then it occurred to you that Lady Lysa was not like the average highborn. After all, adopting a boy she did not know, keeping her children in diapers, and breastfeeding them past infancy... you wonder just how many eccentricities she has.

Once Lysa is clad in her nightly apparel, she walks over to you and Robin with her arms outstretched. She takes Robin's left hand in her right and your left hand in her left. She merrily announces "Let's go, darlings!"

The three of you swiftly leave the bedchamber. Normally, you would try to resist. After all, you were still quite underdressed. All you had on was your diaper. Robin was in a shirt and a diaper, but his padding was fully exposed. However, he did not seem bothered in the least.

When you leave Lady Lysa's bedchamber, the guards posted outside accompany you and your new mother and son down the hallways. They do not seem perturbed by the way any of you are dressed. That strikes you as odd. Do they simply not care what a person wears up here in the Eyrie? Actually, since the Eyrie is rather secluded from the rest of the Vale and the Seven Kingdoms, privacy and discretion are all but guaranteed. In fact, if Lysa had chosen to go out in only her smallclothes with her breasts exposed, perhaps no one else would have batted an eyelid. That's not very likely, but it is a possibility...

At any rate, it appears your apprehension was groundless. So you simply remain silent and allow Lady Lysa to guide you and Robin to the maester's office.

When you get there, you discover that...
135132211112.title: Time for the Boys' Physical

choices: King Robert Baratheon (the realm is at peace)
King Joffrey Baratheon (the realm is at war)
Queen Cersei Lannister (the Army of the Dead is coming)
1353.content:
Overall, you decide that King's Landing would be the most practical place to go. After all, going to the Vale by land alone would be ill-advised, and you would still need to take a boat to get to Dragonstone. King's Landing, however, is accessible to virtually everyone. Plus, you would have better opportunities for work, as well as increased chances of finding a motherly figure.

Once Aerion brings you to the edge of the Riverlands, you urge him towards the south, and then you ride on. A few days later, you follow the Kingsroad all the way to the outskirts of King's Landing. As you approach the capital city, you wonder what awaits you within those grand walls.

Let us stop here for a moment and address another critical matter: Who currently sits the Iron Throne?
1353.title: King's Landing

13533.content:
Much has happened in the last few years. War has torn apart the realm. All nine men who served as Lord Paramount in each of the nine major regions of Westeros are all dead now. A couple of those regions are currently without an official leader, and some have disputed rulers. Although the war has ended, Westeros is still in great disarray. Especially since Jon Snow has been declared by his family's vassals as the new King in the North, and Daenerys Targaryen and her dragons have landed on Dragonstone.

That is no concern of yours, though. You have no family and no one you can really call a close friend, and you have always had to struggle to get by. As such, the war had not affected you as greatly as it had affected most other people in the Seven Kingdoms. The world had been more dangerous, yes, but you were used to danger. In fact, your rough childhood and difficult upbringing had helped you to survive where so many richer, grander, and higher born persons had perished.

As you enter King's Landing, the first thing you notice is the stench. The city indeed reeks strongly of piss, shit, and many other foul odors, just as rumors have suggested. You hope it will either go away, or that you will quickly get used to it. Most likely, it would be the latter situation.

Your first priority is to find some work. There are plenty of shops all throughout Visenya's Hill and the Hill of Rhaenys. Any one of them might offer employment.

Or, alternatively, you can ride up to the Red Keep, located at the top of Aegon's High Hill. With all the threats to the realm, there is surely an increased demand for guards to protect the Queen.

What do you do?
13533.title: Queen Cersei Lannister (the Army of the Dead is...

135332.content:
You ride in the direction of the Red Keep. You have always wanted to see Maegor Targaryen's imposing castle up-close. Plus, there is a chance you might get to see the Queen. Even if you couldn't have an audience with her (which was highly unlikely), you might at least get a glimpse of her.

As you arrive on the grounds of the Red Keep, some stableboys come forward and offer to take charge of your horse for you. You appreciate the gesture, but you ask that they hold off for a moment. After all, you still have yet to find out if there is work here. If not, there would be no point in stabling Aerion.

You spot the captain of the guard in the courtyard, and you make your way over to him. You say courteously "Excuse me, milord. Where might I enlist in the guard force?"

The captain looks you over for a minute, and he tells you "You seem properly built and aptly skilled to make a fine guard, my boy. Alas, I must turn you away. We've already too many in our ranks."

"Too many guards?" you remark, astounded, "With respect, ser, how could one have too many guards? Especially Her Grace?"

"Strange as it may seem, it happens, lad," the captain claims, "You are far from the first I've had to turn away today. However, the Royal Army is always accepting new recruits. You might try your luck there."

"I thank you, ser, but I've no taste for that line of work," you inform him, "I've lasted this long on my own by staying off the front line."

"Some might call that a craven's tactic," the captain mutters, "But I would call it prudence. Keep thinking like that, lad, and you'll live a full life."

You scoff. "Indeed, ser."

You prepare to turn away, but just before you do, the captain of the guard steps in front of you and urges you "Just a moment. May I ask your age?"

"Six and ten," you answer him, "Why?"

He does not give a reply. Instead, he looks you over a second time, and then he thinks aloud "While there are no openings in the guard force, you may be well-suited for another position in the Red Keep."

"What sort of position?" you ask curiously.

"The Queen herself opened it up only recently," the captain explains, "It would involve a great deal of staying by her side."

"So, I would be her attendant?" you assume.

"Not quite," he cryptically responds. "Go inside and speak with Lord Qyburn. He will tell you more."

You smile appreciatively. "Thank you, milord."

You go back to the stable, climb off Aerion, and give him over to the care of the stableboys. You gather most of your supplies, including your sword, shield, and light armor. Then you enter the Red Keep.

What now?
135332.title: Head up to Red Keep

choices: "Help this gentleman out of his attire."
"Escort this gentleman to the Queen's bedchamber."
1353321.content:
You figure it would not bode well for a commoner to roam around the Red Keep unsupervised. With that in mind, you decide to just go right to Lord Qyburn. Wherever he is.

You ask the first person you come across where you might find him, and she supplies you with directions. About ten minutes later, you arrive in the Grand Maester's office, below the rookery. There are no guards on duty. Just two young women, who appear to be maids. They smile warmly, but say nothing.

The door is closed, and you knock on it softly. You hear a voice from within say "Enter."

You carefully push open the door and step inside. An old man in the grey robes of a maester is seated at a desk. Unlike the typical maester, he does not have a chain of many metals hanging from his neck. But that is immaterial to you. What matters is whether this man actually is the Grand Maester.

"Are you the one called Lord Qyburn, ser?" you ask politely.

"I am, child," he tells you, "How might I help you?"

"Well, I just arrived in King's Landing this morning, and I am in search of work," you explain, "The captain of the guard directed me to you. He said you might have an opportunity for me. One which involves serving the Queen."

Qyburn smiles lightly and says "There IS such an opportunity. You look as though you might indeed be qualified for it. But I cannot just give you the position."

"I thought as much," you remark. "What must I do to prove my ability?"

"Sit down," he beckons you, gesturing to the chair on the other side of his desk, "I would speak with you. Your answers will determine whether or not the job will be yours."

"I understand," you tell him.

Qyburn then gives you a lengthy interview. It lasts for over an hour. He asks questions about your background, about your accomplishments, about your travels, and about everything else that would be worthy of some note. As well as some things which you would regard as trivial or insignificant. You are completely honest in your answers, and you give very descriptive responses. You would dare not lie or invent things in front of a member of the Queen's inner circle.

At the end of the interview, Qyburn smiles again and says "A great many young men have applied to this position, my boy, but you are by far the most appealing candidate. The position is yours, if you desire it."

You smile back and declare "Yes, milord. I graciously accept."

You still do not know what the position is, but if it involves being near the Queen, it must be worthwhile.

"Very good," says Qyburn. He then calls out "Dorcas! Senelle!"

The two maids standing outside the office enter the room. The bigger of the two is Dorcas. The redheaded one is Senelle.

Qyburn then issues them a command:
1353321.title: Look for Lord Qyburn straightaway

choices: They give you something odd to wear.
13533212.content:
"Escort this gentleman to the Queen's bedchamber," Qyburn orders them.

Dorcas and Senelle nod, and they motion for you to follow them. You comply right away.

The three of you make your way through the halls of the Red Keep, and you ultimately arrive somewhere in Maegor's Holdfast.

On your way there, you ask "What exactly is the position? Would I be the Queen's attendant?"

"You might call it that, dear boy," Dorcas remarks.

"But in a way, it would be more the Queen who attends to YOU," Senelle reveals.

That baffles you. "I do not quite understand."

"Everything will be made clear in time," Dorcas assures you.

Soon, you reach the Queen's bedchamber. At the moment, it is empty and unguarded. Once you and the maids are inside, Senelle tells you "We are going to undress you now."

"Come again?" you say in surprise.

"This is part of the position," Dorcas claims, "You need not let it bother you."

"Very well," you tell them, "I can undress myself, though."

"We must insist that we do it instead," Senelle remarks.

You sigh and say "Alright then."

Dorcas and Senelle swiftly undress you. They remove your cloak, your boots, your leggings, your hauberk, your doublet, your greaves, your gauntlets, your tunic, and your breeches. Soon you are completely naked.

Do they leave you naked, or do they put you in something... unexpected?
13533212.title: "Escort this gentleman to the Queen's b...

choices: You fall asleep before the Queen comes
You manage to stay awake until she arrives
135332122.content:
Once you are naked, the maids gesture for you to lie down on the queen's large bed. You obey their instructions. The bed is quite soft. Softer than anything else you've ever slept on. Still, you feel a little awkward, lying naked on the queen's bed.

Once you are lying down, Dorcas takes your arms and begins to tie them to the bedposts at the head of the bed. At the same time, Senelle ties your legs to the bedposts at the foot of the bed. You begin to feel a little nervous. You ask "What are you doing?"

"This is just a precaution, my boy," Senelle tells you, "You might wish to resist what happens next."

"What WILL happen next?" you ask, now more worried than before.

"Nothing that will cause you harm," Dorcas claims, "But it may wound your pride."

Once you are bound securely to the bed in an X-shape, Dorcas and Senelle get out a thick white folded piece of cloth. As they unfold it together, you realize it is a large cloth diaper. Suddenly, you understand what is going on.

"Are you going to put that on me?" you ask rhetorically.

"Of course," Senelle answers, "Nappies are all you will be wearing from now on."

"Why?" you ask.

"Because the queen wishes it," Dorcas replies, "Her Grace has recently lost all three of her children. She has been looking for a way to fill in the void they left behind, and she chose to do it by caring for someone of your age."

Your eyes widen in surprise as realization dawns on you. "Then, this 'position' is actually to be the queen's babe?"

"Essentially, that is correct," Senelle confirms.

"Now, we are going to put this nappy on you," Dorcas tells you, "Please hold still and do not struggle. You would risk getting poked with the pins."

While you are very ambivalent about this, you decide not to resist. You are tied down very securely, and you do not wish to aggravate these women.

Dorcas and Senelle then slide the thick cloth diaper underneath your bottom. After applying a bit of powder to your nether regions, they pull the front of the padding up between your legs. Dorcas holds it in place while Senelle fastens it on both sides with pins.

Once you are fastened into the infantile garment, Dorcas and Senelle pat your padded crotch and smile.

"Now you're ready," Senelle remarks, "The Queen will be along shortly. You just lie there and try to relax. You may be unsure of this now, but soon enough, you will come to appreciate this position."

You decided to heed her advice. After all, as strange as this setting may be, there IS a bright side to it. You will be cared for by Cersei Lannister herself, a woman of renowned beauty, and the Queen of the Seven Kingdoms to boot!

Dorcas and Senelle leave you bound and diapered. Despite being in this odd predicament, you feel quaintly comfortable. You wonder if you might fall asleep before you have company again.
135332122.title: Diapered by the Queen's Maids

1353321221.content:
You try to stay awake, but with all the events of the day, and the soft bed under your padded behind, this is a task you fail. Without noticing it you drift off into a pleasant sleep.

When you wake up again your hands are free, but you feel an iron ring around one of your ankles. The first shock is quickly washed away by pleasant smell and a tickling sensation on your face.
You open your eyes and look up at Cersei Lannister.

Surprised you try to get up in a seating position, but she holds you down.
“Hush little one, no need to be afraid, everything is fine.”

“My lady, I am sorry I fell…” you try to explain, but she puts her finger on your mouth and hushes you again.

“Hush baby, no need to apologize, I found you in the best possible way.” She said in a motherly tone and stroke your head.
“I had time to look at you and have your bindings replaced by something a bit more comfortable. If you promise me you will be a good boy, I will take off the iron as well. I was not sure about your reaction, so I took safety-measures.”

You take a deep breath and manage to relax. Her smell is heavenly and the warmth of her body suppress any idea of moving away from her or getting up.
You keep still and let her hand caress your face and chest.
“I am your mommy from now on and that is how you will address me. I look after you and you will be my good little boy. You do not need to worry about anything, but be a happy baby. Do you think you can do that for me?”
1353321221.title: You fall asleep before the Queen comes

choices: “Prepare a bath for the baby. I like him spotless for the night.”
“The baby needs to be fed, nurse him.”
“Take him to his bed, I need to be alone.”
13533212212.content:
"Yes my Lady.“ You say, nodding obediently.

“It is mommy!” the Lannister queen snaps, giving you a little slap on your thigh. “You had better learn that quickly.” She says.

Looking like a beaten dog you quickly nod your head and say “Yes, mommy.”

“Aww, you are such a cutie.” She says and snaps her fingers.

Right away a guard steps from a hidden corner. “My lady.” The huge man says.

You try to wiggle under the blanket, embarrassed about your half nakedness, but Cersei stops you. Then she speaks to the guard.
“Remove the iron and leave. Send me the maids immediately.”

The guard takes the iron off your ankle and leaves you and Cersei alone.

“What now… mommy?” You ask the Queen.

She steps back and waits for the maids to come in.
As soon as the two maids come in the Queen orders….
13533212212.title: “Yes, my Lady.”

choices: "I'd like to talk with you for a bit.”
135332122121.content:
The two maids, Dorcas and Senelle, lead you to the next room which turns out to be a luxury bathroom with a big tub, while the Queen is following you closely.

Once there, the maids unfasten the pins on the sides of your diaper and leave you totally naked. In front of the steaming tub. The Queen herself checks the water temperature and nods to the maids. They guide you into the very warm water.
“Mmm Mommy, it is a bit hot.” You complain, but the Queen shakes her head and pushes you down by the shoulder.
“It needs to be hot, to get you nice and clean.” She says.

Dorcas and Senelle starts to wash your hair and scrub you all over until your whole body is pink.

Cersei is watching you from a low table that – after a second look – turns out to be a big changing table.
“Please get rid of his body hair, this is not what a baby should look like.” She orders.

You tremble a bit when the two maids approach you with razors and shave away every single hair below your eyes. Especially in your private region you are afraid they may cut of something you would miss a lot. As it turn out they are expect with their tools and cut nothing but hair off.

When you step out of the tub your reflection in the mirror is changed a lot. Without a single hair on your body you look a bit more feminine and weaker, even with the muscles you were able to build up in your short life.

As expected you are placed on the changing table and pushed down. Now it is the Queen herself that is handling you. Senelle gives her a stack of diapers that the Queen slides under your behind. Dorcas is handling her a cream to rub into your skin.
“Hold still my little boy, this might feel strange.” The Queen says and start to rub great amounts of cream onto your private parts.

You close your eyes and blush when her hand is rubbing your manhood.
Dorcas and Senelle giggle slightly when blood is shooting into your lower region and you get hard.
“I think he likes to be diapered, my lady.” Dorcas says.

You try to roll over to avoid the embarrassment, but the queen hold you down with one hand, while her other hand is manipulating you. “Hush baby, it is fine. Mommy wants to give you a treat before you go to bed.”

Encouraged by her, you try to relax, and seconds later you cum in her hand. She hold the hand to her right and Dorcas cleans it up in a sensual way.

In a fog of pleasure you feel the queen pin the diapers close until she tickles your feet to bring you to your senses again. “Hey little boy, time to go to bed.” She grins and helps you up.
The thick diaper is making you waddle next to the queen, which leads you to a crib that has been placed next to her bed. The crib looks like an open cage with tall rails. It is a bit scary…

“This is only for the first night, if you behave I'll get you lower rails, and if you are really good I may allow you to sleep next to me.” The queen says.

You still do not like to go into the crib and stop. You need to find an excuse to stay awake for a bit longer, at least.
“Mommy, ….
135332122121.title: “Prepare a bath for the baby. I like him spot...

1353321221211.content:
You shyly gaze at the ground, wondering how the Queen will react. You worry she may be cross with you for not obeying her order to get into the crib straightaway.

Thankfully, your worries turn out to be for naught. Instead of chastising you, raising her voice to you, or doing any other disciplinary action, she smiles sweetly, steps closer to you, and wraps you in a gentle hug. This sudden show of affection surprises you. You are not certain if that is because the queen is the one showing it, or because you simply are not accustomed to this sort of treatment.

Whatever the case, you gradually raise your arms and hug your new mother back.

When Queen Cersei finally pulls away, she is still smiling. She then pats your diapered bottom and says "You should have told Mummy in the first place, sweetie. Now that you're all clean and in your nappies, I would be happy to get you something to eat."

You smile at that and say appreciatively "Thank you, Mummy."

She just grins again and takes your hand in yours. She turns to Dorcas and Senelle - who are still in the room, awaiting orders from their mistress - and tells them...
1353321221211.title: I am hungry.”

13533212212112.content:
That command startles you a little. You look to the Queen, uncertain if you heard her right. She notices your astonishment, and she tells you soothingly "Do not fret, my dear. In addition to being excellent maids and attendants, these two are experienced wet nurses, as well."

You look back at Dorcas and Senelle, and they both nod their heads to confirm Queen Cersei's declaration. They say in unison "We live to serve you and your mother, milord."

"V-very well," you say uncertainly. Cersei Lannister notes your apprehension, and she lovingly pats your padded bottom again to ease you.

"You shouldn't feel uncomfortable," she tells you, "These two will only be breastfeeding you for the first few days of our new relationship. Once you have settled in, we can try putting you at my breast, instead."

You blush at that, but you nod your head, trying not to get too excited at the prospect of suckling the royal teats.

"Think of these two women as your secondary caretakers," Cersei advises you, "As much as I would prefer to keep you by my side all day long, that will not be possible, as I have a kingdom to rule. I can afford to spend mornings and evenings with you, but afternoons are when I am occupied with my royal duties. Thus, during the middle of the day, Dorcas and Senelle will attend to your every need. They will feed you, change you, play with you, wash you, sing you lullabies, and even relieve you when you are tense. They will also discipline you if you misbehave, so see that you do not act up."

You slightly cringe in fear, but then you nod again and remark "Yes, Mommy. I'll be good."

Cersei smiles once more and hugs you again. Then she takes your hand and leads you over to the maids. You nervously cross the bedroom to the young women, waddling in your thick, bulky diapers.

When you get closer, you realize that both Dorcas and Senelle are not much older than you. They could be in their late teenage years; twenty or twenty-one at the most. While neither of them is as beautiful as the queen, they are both fairly pleasing to look at.

When you and Cersei are within reach of the maids, she turns to you and asks "Who would you like to nurse you tonight? Whoever you pick, the other shall nurse you tomorrow morning."

You think about who to select. Dorcas is the larger in height, which suggests that her milk would be more nutritious. Meanwhile, Senelle has the larger bust, which suggests that her tits would carry more milk.

Which do you pick?
13533212212112.title: "Nurse the baby."

135332122121122.content:
"I'd like to nurse from… Senelle.“ You say and the girls smile.

The maid takes your hand from the queen and leads to you a three-seater couch, where she sits at the end, leaving enough space for you. Blushing a bit, you rest your head on her lap and look up at her as she loosens her dress and lets it slide off her shoulders, revealing her nice full breasts.

Like a mother, she slides her arm under your head and guide your lips to her hardening nipple.
A little worried you look at the Queen, who took a seat right in front of you.
“It is okay baby, drink from her. It is fine.” She encourages you.

You obediently close your lips around her nipple and start to suck.

You have no memories of being nursed and you are surprised when you feel a warm milky liquid on your tongue. The taste is… awesome. It is nice and a bit sweet. You lick your lips and suck harder, making Senelle moan out loud. She wordlessly strokes your hair to calm you down, and strangely, it works. You slow down and massage her nipple with your tongue, milking it.

“Is he gentle?” You hear the queen’s voice.

“Yessss, very… “ Senelle answers in a moan. “He… he is using is tongue…. That feels…. Very nice.” She shivers.

The Queen nods her head, satisfied, and strokes your face with her elegant hand. “I knew that he was something special.” She whispers and continue to watch you drink…


After you nursed on both tits you feel satisfied and full. The amount was more that you had guessed and you feel nice and sleepy.

“Okay baby, time to go to bed.” Queen Cersei says and….
135332122121122.title: Choose Senelle

choices: You wake up in the middle of the night, dry
You wake up when the sun rises, wet
1353321221211221.content:
Queen Cersei carefully pulls you to your feet, takes your hand in hers once more, and she guides you over to the crib beside her bed. You waddle beside her, holding tight to her hand. After Senelle fixes the top of her dress, she and Dorcas follow their mistress.

You are still a little nervous about sleeping in this bed that somewhat resembles a cage, but you decide not to protest. After all, the Queen DID say it would just be for the first night. Soon enough, she would probably allow you to share her bed. That would make a couple nights in a crib worth it.

When you reach the crib, Cersei lowers the bars to it. Then she and the maids help you into it. It is large enough that you can stretch out without bending anything, and the mattress is quite comfortable. It is a little cold and drafty, though. Thankfully, the Queen has accounted for that.

As you place your head on the soft pillows, Dorcas and Senelle hand Cersei Lannister some thick, soft blankets. The Queen proceeds to cover you with them, and she tucks you in securely. When she is finished, you are bundled up nice and warm. You are pleased by that. Winter has just begun, and you could not imagine going to bed in just a diaper unless you had sufficient heat from another source.

After tucking you in, Cersei leans over and places a tender kiss on your forehead. She tells you softly "Sweet dreams, Baby."

You smile and whisper softly "Good night, Mummy." She smiles back.

Dorcas and Senelle then raise the bars of the crib and secure them in place. You are effectively trapped, but you do not mind. You are too warm, cozy, and tired to protest.

The queen's maids then help her prepare for bed, as well. They go off to the other end of the room, and they help her out of her clothing. As tempted as you are to stare, you decide to look away, out of respect. Soon enough, you are certain you'll be able to see the queen's whole body. You do not want to risk damaging the relationship you've already developed by peeping on her without permission.

A couple minutes later, the queen has exchanged her long, flowing dress for a slightly less modest nightgown and robe. She looks just as beautiful in the latter as she did in the former. By now, you are convinced that Cersei Lannister would look gorgeous in just about anything!

Queen Cersei tells Dorcas and Senelle "You are dismissed for the night. Should I or my baby require anything of you before morning, I will summon you."

The maids bow to the queen, and they exit the bedchamber, leaving you and Cersei alone.

Cersei decides to stay up a while longer. She pours herself a glass of wine, sits down on her couch, and begins to read a book. You, on the other hand, choose to get some rest. Given how you are diapered, swaddled, and stuck in a crib, you do not have many other options. Aside from that, you've had a long day, and you have a feeling tomorrow will be just as eventful. So, with little difficulty, you drift off into a peaceful slumber.
1353321221211221.title: Guides you to the crib.

choices: “Baby, come to mommy and let her feel that magic tongue.”
“I have an appointment, please change him.”
13533212212112212.content:
When you wake up again the sun has already started to shine into the room. You stretch out and smile, thinking about the nice place you are in, compared to your situation two days ago. Everything is nice, but then you realize something…
